example.name: chord-artic
example.description: Demonstration of how to encode articulations on single notes and on chords. There are 4 staccato marks in this example applied to 6 notes.

file.name: arctic.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: arctic.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
